mapper.select: select boardnum ,name ,title ,hits ,to_char(indate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as indate from board_tb order by boardnum desc
boardnum ,name ,title ,content ,hits ,to_char(indate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as indate from board_tb where boardnum = #{num}
mapper.update: update board_tb set hits = hits + where boardnum = #{num}
